H0.text: Which multi-talented actor played Mr Burns and Derek Smalls. Dan Castellaneta

H1.text: Which multi-talented actor played Mr Burns and Derek Smalls. Christopher Guest

H2.text: Which multi-talented actor played Mr Burns and Derek Smalls. Michael McKean

H3.text: Which multi-talented actor played Mr Burns and Derek Smalls. Harry Shearer

A4.text: Shearer is the voice of Mr. Burns, Waylon Smithers, Ned Flanders, Reverend Lovejoy, Lenny Leonard, Kang, Principal Skinner, Kent Brockman, Otto Mann, and formerly Dr. Hibbert.

A5.text: Shearer co-created, co-wrote and co-starred in the film This Is Spinal Tap (1984), a hit satirical rockumentary.
